title: FS: Round 2 - Higher Grade RAY DEMMITT (St. Louis) T-206s
author: JP

posts.post_title: FS: Round 2 - Higher Grade RAY DEMMITT (St. Louis) T-206s
posts.post_content:
You may have seen my previous recent post that had Authentic, Authentic-Altered, and PSA 1 through 1.5.  These are the significantly better Demmitts.  

I'll accept Paypal + 3% (unless sending "gift" or "payment owed"), cashier's checks, or money orders. All prices include shipping...

[url]http://imageevent.com/jmpkcp/raydemmitt[/url]

[URL="http://imageevent.com/jmpkcp/raydemmitt?p=3&w=4&c=2&n=0&m=15&s=0&y=1&z=3&l=0"]PSA 2[/URL] -- MOVED TO EBAY 
[URL="http://imageevent.com/jmpkcp/raydemmitt?p=0&n=1&m=15&c=2&l=0&w=4&s=0&z=3"]PSA 2.5[/URL] -- SOLD
[URL="http://imageevent.com/jmpkcp/raydemmitt?p=2&w=4&c=2&n=0&m=15&s=0&y=1&z=3&l=0"]PSA 3[/URL] -- MOVED TO EBAY 
[URL="http://imageevent.com/jmpkcp/raydemmitt?p=1&w=4&c=2&n=0&m=15&s=0&y=1&z=3&l=0"]PSA 4[/URL] -- MOVED TO EBAY 

I will consider offers, especially on purchases of multiples. PM me with offers, or if you want an individual card at the prices listed, post in this thread the PSA serial number and you've got it! If you are buying at the listed price, post take priority over e-mails.

JP,

Really cool how many of these you have.. Good luck with the sale..

Any research you have done on this card I would love to read one day..

Jamie
JP, thanks for the speedy and ultra-secure shipping - the PSA 2.5 copy arrived in record time, and is much nicer in person.  Many thanks.

First, last and only price reduction before
these hit eBay or a major auction...
